TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, he destroyed reality too

I wish kraken was a part on ksp

Granted. One day, while out walking it, you walk past Danny2462. Just being in his presence, the baby kraken swells to a massive size then promptly eats the sun. Your death is very cold.

Stop Ninja-ing me! Granted. Danny touches the Kraken part and manages to summon the KSP cthulu, promptly breaking all KSP copies

I wish I had more rep.

Granted. You are now required to leave the forum games.

I wish Absol was real, and liked everyone, except those that wanted to bring her harm or intense discomfort.

Granted, but as soon as she wakes up, she is sat on by a Snorlax and can't get up ever. The snorlax will never get up.

I wish latios was real, and friendly to my friends and I.

granted, but then he die 1 sec later

I wish i could shift into any aircraft

Granted. The moment you turn into an aircraft, you lose all awareness of who you are, and are no longer sentient. As such, you can not will yourself to do anything, so really you just make an aircraft and died.

I wish I wasn't so morbid.

Granted, instead you re on the sun surface

I wish eve was on the position for my transfer

Granted, you crash into it at interplanetary speeds.

I wish for a friend.

granted, but he wants to kill you

I wish kerbals arrived to earth "PEACEFULLY"

Granted, but when they join the space program, they ACCIDENTALLY crash everything and everyone dies.

I wish for red vs blue season 13 to be on netflix

granted, its on netflix after season 20 was released

I wish i could control atoms

Granted. You can already do that on a large scale, though, so nothing happens.

I wish for the ability to turn any object visible or invisible at will.

granted, but they re all unstable and high explosive

I wish i could breath underwater

Granted, but ONLY underwater.

I wish for a new dragonball series.

granted, it so crappy that people want to suicide after watching it

i wish brasil dominated the world

Granted. The entire surface of the world has been converted to Brazil. Lacking any oceans, biomes collapse and weather systems run amok. As the last few inhabitants of this new world contemplate their fate, an old gaucho proposes one last game of football (soccer) before the end.

I wish I could be on the ballot for the US presidential elections next year -- not win, but just be on the ballot.

granted, but then you win, and you re the worst president ever

i wish i could change my size

Granted. Your options are microscopic or 10 feet tall. Nothing in between.

I wish that people were smarter.

granted, but now you re dumb

I wish i could HUE BR

Granted, but the people in your comic get replaced with better drawn, nicer looking characters.

I wish to control the forum games section!

Granted, you have to moderate EVERYTHING yourself. And if you fail, you die.

I wish for pgiahshjugoadp;gnfioql7naikfgqoerwybolwknlwoubyg'au[nj

Granted, but somewhere along the line one letter is screwed up, and instead you get pgiahshjugoadp;gnfilql7naikfgqoerwybolwknlwoubyg'a u[nj

I wish Dark hadn't posted

Granted, but I thought you said roasted, so I mashed my potatoes instead.

I wish I was the Banana king.

Granted. You get into a war with the cucumber king and are beheaded.

I wish the forum was actually active today

Granted, it goes out for some exercise.

I wish I was capable of owning the best computer ever.
